author: adammurdoch
msg: - Load list of providers from a config file, rather than hard-coding them.
- Allow the ClassLoader to load providers from to be set.

author: adammurdoch
msg: Create the FileSystemManager once per provider test suite, rather than once per test case.
Allows connections to be pooled/reused/etc, making the tests heaps faster.

author: adammurdoch
msg: Username and password were in the wrong order.  Oops.
